item.title: Workflow - FMI MCL
item.description: Synposis Workflow Structure Transformations Simulation (DSE) Workflow Example task generate-fmimcl -- FMU_NAME=foo

item.title: Workflow - ModelC FMU
item.description: Synposis Generate an FMU which includes the ModelC Runtime and a complete simulation. Workflow Structure examples/direct └── sim │ ├── data │ │ └── simulation.yml │ │ └── direct_index.yml <-- Workflow generated direct index (SignalGroup). │ └── model │ └── direct │ └── lib/libdirect.so │ └── data/model.yml └── fmu └── direct/ <-- Packaged FMU layout (can be directly operated). └── direct.fmu <-- FMU archive file. Transformations generate-fmimodelc gen-modelcfmu gen-modelcfmu-annotations GenFmiModelcCommand (gen-modelcfmu) signalgroups Signal Groups to export as FMU variables default is all
